titleStmt.title: Homer A la Mode a mock poem upon the first and second books of Homer's Iliads.
titleStmt.author: Scudamore, James, 1624-1668.
Scudamore, James, 1641 or 2-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. H. for Ric. Davis,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to James Scudamore. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Sometimes attributed to James, son of John Scudamore, 1st viscount Scudamore. Cf. DNB. 2nd ed. XVII, 1094.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
